text:
11/5/25
Another take out and the standards is still the same as before! Very delicious, satisfying and happy experience!

9/12/24.
Was very impressed with the meticulous presentation for our delivery. The chef has put in their heart and fantastic culinary skills to ensure we have a wonderful experience. The seafood is tender and well seasoned, the paella is of perfect rice consistency! We enjoyed our meal! Thank you!

Iâ€™ve always enjoyed Fish & Co. and had great experiences at other outlets, but this visit was really disappointing.

First, the prawns were overcooked to the point that the meat was completely stuck to the shell. Anyone who has eaten at other Fish & Co. locations knows that their prawns are usually fresh and well-cooked, sliding right out of the shellâ€”but not here. When I pointed it out, they offered to remake the dish, but even the second batch had the same issue. It really made me wonder if the prawns were even fresh to begin with.

Then there was the squid. Almost a third of the pieces were still translucent instead of properly cooked. It was clear that not enough attention was given to preparing the dish correctly.

The worst part, however, was the dessert. When the ice cream arrived, there were ants crawling all over the bowl. It takes time for ants to gather, which raises serious concerns about how the food is being handled in the kitchen.

I still think Fish & Co. is a great brand, but I canâ€™t recommend this outlet. The lack of consistency in cooking and the hygiene issues were really disappointing, and I hope they take steps to improve.

The two poor service staff were running around to serve the hungry crowd during valentine night. They were professional. However, there is a significant drop in the classic fish and chip. While the batter is well done, but the fish is tasteless. Marination was not doneâ€¦
It was decent... Nothing too special at this price point, service was attentive and friendly but nothing else really stood out. Also for sides, definitely need more options.
Fish tasted great. However the lunch set is really tiny, we had to order 3 sets for 2 people ðŸ˜‚
